name: Ponzu Sauce
recipeIngredient: 75-100 ml yuzu juice (substitute 2 lemons or limes),
recipeInstructions: 1. Put the bonito flakes and kombu seaweed into a bottle.
2. Squeeze the citrus fruit and add the measured amount into the bottle.
3. Add the soy sauce and mirin.
4. Shake the bottle and leave in the fridge for 24 hours.
